students.name: Aleena Tim
students.about: I'm currently a Junior Computer Science student studying at Hunter College in New York City. I am aspiring software engineer and during my free time, I like to play MOBA games and code new projects!

work.title: Coding Instructor
work.description: Assigned projects that covers fundamental coding concepts and topics to reinforce computer science knowledge.Communicated with the CEO about classroom structure, project ideas and instructor progress. Coordinated virtual visits and training sessions to grade each instructor’s performance and engagement of the class. Hosted end-of-the-year “coding fairs” for students to showcase their best projects for parents, students and staff and were given prizes

work.title: WiTNY Robotics Research
work.description: Designed various educational games for the NAO Robot in order to enforce positive social and cognitive skills for children with disabilities. Utilized the NAO Robot’s object recognition, speech recognition and touch sensors to capture and respond to several sign language gestures. Constructed a research presentation regarding the NAO Robot's capabilities and its positive impact for early childhood education

projects.title: IGN Video Playlist
projects.description: (Developed a responsive, single-page video playlist app using JavaScript, CSS and HTML and pulling data from IGN’s API w/ Ajax. Video player includes custom stylized video controls and the playlist queue. Loads the first video in the playlist into the video element on initial page load. After each video finishes playback, the next video in the list is automatically played until the playlist is completed). Created response single-page video playlist with JS, CSS, HTML Connected to IGN’s public API using AJAX, displaying the latest videos, titles, description, tags and dates Coded customized video controls and automatic playback queue to complete each video in the playlist

projects.title: College Statistics Data App
projects.description: Created a multi-page application to incorporate different data from each college in order to provide the best information for new students. The application is intended to be used by recent high school graduates or transfer students that want to view a list of college choices that best fits their needs. Developed a multi-page CUNY Statistics Web Scraping Data App with Anaconda, streamlit and Python Parsed important data (web scraping) from niche.com using pandas and BeautifulSoup onto a scatter plot and bar graph using matplot library Implemented filtering and sorting to retrieve specific information such as type of college, tuition, ranking, room and board, admission rate, SAT/ACT requirements, etc.

projects.title: Coronavirus Warehouse Website
projects.description: Developed a fully-functional covid supply store website using PHP, SQL, CSS and HTML through a software engineering sequence of planning (basic functionality), system analysis (case diagram, data flow diagram), system design (entity relationship and mapping (E-R Diagram), data design, database design, GUI, data normalization fields w/ corresponding relational tables)  and working prototype.
